name: .KIFR File Extension
summary: Learn about .KIFR files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Because KIFR files are encrypted, you cannot open them. At this time, there is no way to decrypt KIFR files. The best way to restore files encrypted by KIFR ransomware is to retrieve them from a recent backup or perform a System Restore.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
